# callType

**Instance Property**

The call type.

## Declaration

```swift
var callType: INCallRecordType { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to limit your search to the specified type of calls. If the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallRecordType/unknown], search all call types.

## Getting the Call History Details

- **dateCreated**: The range of dates associated with the call records.
- **callTypes**: The types of calls to search.
- **callCapabilities**: The audio-video capabilities of the call.
- **unseen**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has seen the call yet.
